metadata.title: CVE-2022-2587 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds write in Chrome OS Audio Server in Google Chrome on Chrome OSprior to 102.0.5005.125 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploitheap corruption via crafted audio metadata.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
